author: Sabrina Snyder
title: Baked Sweet and Spicy Mustard Chicken
ingredients: 1 teaspoon hot sauce (, Tapatio or Sriracha)
instructions:
Marinate
Mix all ingredients together in a medium bowl and marinate 4 hours.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
Line a 9x13 baking dish with parchment paper.
Add the chicken and and the marinade to the prepared dish, skin side up.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the skin is crisp and the chicken is cooked through.
instructions_list: Mix all ingredients together in a medium bowl and marinate 4 hours.
Line a 9x13 baking dish with parchment paper.
Add the chicken and and the marinade to the prepared dish, skin side up.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the skin is crisp and the chicken is cooked through.
description: Baked Sweet & Spicy Honey Mustard Chicken is an easy recipe for crispy chicken thighs marinated in hot honey, garlic, and Dijon mustard sauce.
keywords: Baked Sweet & Spicy Honey Mustard Chicken
